parameters.name: DataQualityRules
parameters.description: The list of monitoring rules that are associated with the monitor. If you configure the ID of a monitoring rule by using the DataQualityRule.Id parameter, the system associates the rule with a created monitor. If you do not configure the ID of a monitoring rule, the system creates a new monitoring rule by using other fields and associates the rule with a created monitor.

parameters.name: DataSourceId
parameters.description: The data source ID. You can call the [ListDataSources](~~211431~~) operation to query the ID.

parameters.name: ProjectId
parameters.description:
The ID of the DataWorks workspace. You can log on to the [DataWorks console](https://workbench.data.aliyun.com/console) and go to the Workspace page to query the ID.

You can use this parameter to specify the DataWorks workspace on which you want to perform the API operation.

parameters.name: RuntimeConf
parameters.description:
The extended configurations in JSON-formatted strings. You can use this parameter only for monitors that are used to monitor the quality of E-MapReduce (EMR) data.

*   queue: The Yarn queue used when a monitor checks the quality of EMR data. By default, the queue configured for the current workspace is used.

*   sqlEngine: The SQL engine used when a monitor checks the quality of EMR data.

    *   HIVE_SQL
    *   SPARK_SQL

parameters.name: Target
parameters.description: The monitored object of the monitor.

parameters.name: Trigger
parameters.description: The trigger configuration of the monitor.
